title: The League Tool/App You Wish You had

embed.description: Hey people of reddit, I'm looking to build an application for League of Legends and I'd like to get opinions on what tools the community feel like are missing and thats where you come in ;) It'll take a minute tops <3

body: Hey people of the boards, so I'm looking to develop a tool for League (most likely a mobile application) because I feel like there are a few niches yet to be filled. I've listed several options I've had thus far as well as given you space to state your own ideas, and I'd love to get feedback! <3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
